property.name: text
property.value: This is a simple Neural Network for handwritten digit recognition. The 28x28 pixel handwritten digit image must be converted to a single column val.csv file. The val.csv values must be normalized to the [0,1] interval.

property.name: text
property.value: This is a transparent composite actor. It must be contained in an SDF director.
